did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.unittitle: Vitaliano Bernardino Papers,
did.abstract: Writings and printed matter, relating to education in Southeast Asia.

userestrict.head: Publication Rights
userestrict.p: For copyright status, please contact the Hoover Institution Archives.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: [Identification of item], Vitaliano Bernardino Papers, [Box no.], Hoover Institution Archives.

chronitem.event: M.A., Education and Psychology, University of the Philippines

Director, Southeast Asian Ministers of Education Secretariat

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content of Collection
scopecontent.p: Writings and printed matter, relating to education in Southeast Asia.

did.unittitle: BIOGRAPHICAL FILE, 1956-1971.

scopecontent.p: Biographical writings, arranged alphabetically by author, and bibliographies.

did.unittitle: Biographical writings

Balatbat, Ramon G. and Pat H. Gonzales, Local Book Publishing: A Basic Industry, The Booklover's Bulletin, vol. VII, no. 1, January 1964, p. 4, 27-28, 33. Printed copy. Interview and biographical sketch.
The Energetic and Dynamic Leader, Vitaliano Bernardino, Division Superintendent of Schools for Pangasinan, The Pangasinan Educator, vol. XI, no. 5, February - March, 1956, p. 6-8.
Portugal, Virginia, The Educational Views of Dr. Vitaliano Bernardino, MA thesis, University of the Philippines, 1971.
Bibliography of speeches, 1957-1968.
